title: The First Chronicle Of Hirem Bantazzar
description: Follow the exploits of the titular character Hirem Bantazzar as he struggles to control his newfound magical abilities. From the desert battlefields of the southern continent to the cursed summit of Alcazzor Mountain, Hirem comes to grips with an ancient power that will some day rule his destiny. Along the way he gains many stalwart allies and vanquishes many powerful foes. This is the inaugural book of the Hirem Bantazzar Chronicles series.
author: James Sausville
